channel.title: Runserver
channel.description:
Ok, whenever I try to run my server I get an error. I log in 2 seconds later it logs me out and says i'm already online. Please help..
[code]The Battle Is Now ONLINE!
Starting The Battle On 0.0.0.0:3737 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 37 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1256) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code]
That's the error

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

[quote=“wignall6, post:8, topic:97681”]Right Click On Your ‘Run Server’ Button And Click ‘Edit’, Delete What is In There And Copy This

@echo off color 3a title WiggyScape Official java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Then ‘File’ Then ‘Save’. If That Doesnt Work Please Post Your ‘Run Server’ Code Here.[/quote]

Dude that’s not it. Xx nub xx, could you add me Jordanlovegrove@yahoo.ca and I will show you whats in my autospawn. Because I don’t think there is anything wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @wignall6 wignall6
item.description:
@wignall6 wrote:

Right Click On Your ‘Run Server’ Button And Click ‘Edit’, Delete What is In There And Copy This

@echo off color 3a title WiggyScape Official java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Then ‘File’ Then ‘Save’. If That Doesnt Work Please Post Your ‘Run Server’ Code Here.

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

I’m not sure about this.
I think you’ve used to many spaces in npchandler.
Otherwise it can’t find the files in your source.

item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Ok, whenever I try to run my server I get an error. I log in 2 seconds later it logs me out and says i’m already online. Please help…

[code]The Battle Is Now ONLINE!

Starting The Battle On 0.0.0.0:3737
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5
37 "

java:48)
